name: KuroTD
description:
Missions :

  • Level 1 : Survive Human Campaign!
  • Level 2 : Survive Orc Campaign!
  • Level 3 : Survive Elf Campaign!
  • Level 4 : Survive Undead Campaign!
  • Level 5 : Survive an Infinite Campaign!!!

Features :

  • 3 Tower Types: Archer, Cannon & Mage
  • 5 Unique Upgrades Per Tower Type
  • RTS Style Camera (Similar to Warcraft 3 & Starcraft 2)
    • Additional Top View Toggle Button
  • Unity Game Engine physics and graphics

A 3D Tower Defence that's sure to provide a challenge worth conquering!
